name: yu-gi-oh.exe
description:
EXE games are still a thing... right?

You play as Shadi, your average egyptian man, as he goes on a quest to defeat Yami Yugi.

Hearing of his murders and chaos, Shadi tracks him down to Kaiba Manor, which he has taken over and is now filled with a few monsters from THE SHADOW REALM (oh no!)

Will Shadi be able to defeat the evil Yami? Who knows.

(Additional Context: Yugi becomes Yami the same way he did in the Manga (or Season 0). Except he's more murder-y.)

YU-GI-OH! is owned by Konami and Kazuki Takahashi, PLEASE DON'T SUE ME! IT'S JUST A LIL' FAN GAME!
